div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2190 Gela, 1956-1957 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 2 AR, 6 AE Pegasi: 2 Syracuse* Syracuse: 1 AE, (Apollo/Pegasus) 5 AE (Agathocles, Artemis/thun- derbolt) * The one specimen illustrated in NSc does not appear to be of Syracuse, where hd. of Athena to 1. is very uncommon Disposition: Gela Orlandini, NSc 1960, pp. 203-4, illus.
